item.title: Jaipur, The Great Pink City
item.description: Ahh, Rajasthan! The place of rich heritage and stunning architecture. For me this was a highlight of the tour as this is an area Iâ€™ve not previously visited. Jaipur, known as the Pink City is the largest Indian state in Rajasthan. Our day began visiting Amber Fort. Located on a hill, the fort combines a beautiful blend of Hindu & Mughal architecture (think red sand stone and white marble). The interior of the palace displays impressive artwork, carvings and mirrored walls.
